name: Color Computer 16 (The Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Prototype)
name_original: Color Computer 16 (The Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Prototype)
description:
CURRENTLY NOT OPTIMIZED FOR WEB. USE DESKTOP VERSIONS Heyo! I think everyone on the team learned a lot from the making of this game. All of us probably wish we knew what we were doing a little better while making this. Except our sound guy. He's cool. (Possible seizure warning if you're a stupid idiot imbecile fool and scroll the mouse wheel at mach 5)
CONTROLS:
  • A & D for left and right
  • F to toggle on [something]
  • Scroll Wheel to select [something]'s mode
  • E to interact with the world and text boxes
Installation

It is recommended that you install to a dedicated folder. If you have 7zip, you can do this by right-clicking the file and selecting "extract to Color Computer 16/**"

MAKE SURE THAT THE "dialogic" FOLDER IS IN THE SAME DIRECTORY AS THE EXECUTABLE OR YOU WILL BE SOFTLOCKED.
